remarks: A point (singleton of an atom) is a projective subspace.  Remark below Definition 15.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 61.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pointpsub.p $e |- P = ( Points ` K ) $.
pointpsub.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
pointpsubN $p |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ X e. P ) -> X e. S ) $.
